lines.text: I'm trying to figure out all the angles here, but I don't know how Reversing Rune could've been fatal.
Like, maybe if you stick it on something that isn't moving, it gets confused?
It wanted to make something go backwards, but the only moving thing was his blood, so...
All his blood started going backwards at once, and it made his heart explode out of his chest?
Second: there ain't a lot of blood down the guy's front. No splatter, see?
Huh? Uh, yeah, but what's that mean?
Means nothin' exploded. There'd be droplets everywhere.
So... that's a dead end, then.
